programs.program_name: Master for Arts in Chinese Studies

entry_requirements_raw.Degree: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field with a minimum CGPA of 2.75 OR Bachelor's degree or equivalent with a CGPA of 2.50 or above, but at least 5 years of work experience in the relevant field, and be admitted after passing the interview assessment..  Proof of Chinese listening, speaking, reading and writing ability. Submit a research proposal of about 2,000 words

course_content.core: Research Interests: Chinese History and Culture, Ancient Chinese Literature, Classical Chinese Philology, Modern and Contemporary Chinese Literature, Chinese Language and Philology, Malaysian Chinese Literature, Malaysian Chinese Society and Culture.

Degree.text: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field with a minimum CGPA of 2.75 OR Bachelor's degree or equivalent with a CGPA of 2.50 or above, but at least 5 years of work experience in the relevant field, and be admitted after passing the interview assessment..  Proof of Chinese listening, speaking, reading and writing ability. Submit a research proposal of about 2,000 words

programs.program_name: Doctor of Philosophy in Chinese Studies

entry_requirements_raw.Masters: - A Master’s Degree in Mandarin descipline or - Other qualifications equivalent to a Master’s Degree that are accepted by the Senate; or - An applicant without Mandarin Descipline required to take 3 prerequisite courses.

course_content.core: Year 1 Research Methodology Prerequisite Courses x2 Reading Report x2 Year 2 Research Proposal Defence 25% of thesis (draft) 50% of thesis (draft) 100% of thesis (draft) 75% of thesis (draft) Year 3 Pre Viva Voce Viva Voce

Masters.text: - A Master’s Degree in Mandarin descipline or - Other qualifications equivalent to a Master’s Degree that are accepted by the Senate; or - An applicant without Mandarin Descipline required to take 3 prerequisite courses.
